page.title: 15Religion in our area.
page.content: There are different kinds of Christianity in our area:_{Roman {Catholic,Church of England}and {Methodist.}I go to the{Broad Lane {Methodist Sunday School}every{Sunday from{10.45 to 12.00.}We sing songs about{Jesus,}read the{Bible}and say prayers.We learn to be kind and helpful.Each year we have{Anniversary where every child sings or says a poem.we are given a prize.There are four{Methodist Chapels}in our area:_ {Broad Lane,Paynter's Lane End}and {Roscroggan.}Rebecca goes to the{Parish {Church of St.Illogan.}Her{Sunday {School}is from{10.30 to 11.00.}She does a work- sheet and sometimes acts a Biblical play.They have a{Tea treat at{St.Ives}every year.There is a{Roman {Catholic Church}in{Camborne.}In our class of{34,26%}go to{Sunday School.
